thread.title: Athlete of the Week: American Heritage's Devin Singletary
thread.title_full: Athlete of the Week: American Heritage's Devin Singletary

title: Athlete of the Week: American Heritage's Devin Singletary
text:
Athlete of the Week: American Heritage's Devin Singletary 
by John Evenson/CBS12DELRAY BEACH, Fla. (CBS12) - The American Heritage Football team won big against Fort Pierce Central this past Friday thanks to a downhill running game. The guy who seems to tilt that field almost every week is the CBS12 Athlete of the Week - Devin Singletary.Devin Singletary's nickname is "Motor" and for good reason."Just keep going, never stop just keep grinding.""The kid never stops, he never stops working hard, on and off the field he's a great asset to our program, and just develope such a great running ability by never stopping."And it shows in his stats - 22 carries for 144 and 3 touchdowns in last Friday's win over Fort Pierce Central. On the season so far, he has 86 carries for 772 yards 11 TDs, along with one touchdown catch."He's a great leader, he works hard," says Head Coach Keith Hindsley. "I mean he's been here since he was a freshman he developed the program and the programs been set on him and that's a major part of our identity.""I know many people in this world who can't have this opportunity and would love to have this opportunity," adds Singletary. "So I just take full advantage of it every time.""He's just hungry, he's just hungry, he's a Beast," says Heritage lineman Lamonte McDougal. "I've never seen nothing like him."And a major reason to why so many elite college football programs want Singletary on their team next season."FSU, North Carolina, Wake Forest, FAU, UM, Illinois ..that's quite a list.""I tell ya, whoever gets Motor on their team is going to be a lucky team, Because he works hard and gives you all he's got, and he'll do exactly what you tell him." Athlete of the Week: American Heritage's Devin Singletary 
Wednesday, October 14 2015, 12:48 AM
